s.text: growing up you could sleep with your windows open well even my kids were growing up we didn't lock our house at night we just went to bed you know and left the doors open the windows open you could walk take walks at night you can't do that anymore

growing up you could sleep with your windows open well even my kids were growing up we didn't lock our house at night we just went to bed you know and left the doors open the windows open you could walk take walks at night you can't do that anymore

i i don't think it's anything wrong for a doctor to refuse to i don't care about the Hippocratic oath i don't think they should have to treat a patient with AIDS if they don't want to you know why take a chance like that doctor in New York that got infected from a patient and you know she ended up i think
second chance yeah yeah
